00216 #ifndef _PVM3_H_
00217 
00218 #define _PVM3_H_

00220 /*
00221 *       Release version
00222 */
00223 
00224 #define PVM_VER                         "3.4.2"
00225 #define PVM_MAJOR_VERSION       3
00226 #define PVM_MINOR_VERSION       4
00227 #define PVM_PATCH_VERSION       2
00228 
00229 #ifndef WIN32
00230 #include        <sys/time.h>
00231 #else
00232 #include "pvmwin.h"
00233 #include <sys/timeb.h>
00234 #include <time.h>
00235 #endif
00236 
00237 /*
00238 *       Data packing styles for pvm_initsend()
00239 */
00240 
00241 #define PvmDataDefault  0       /* XDR encoding */
00242 #define PvmDataRaw              1       /* Raw data copy */
00243 #define PvmDataInPlace  2       /* Raw data, left in place */
00244 #define PvmDataFoo              PvmDataDefault  /* Internal use */
00245 #define PvmDataTrace    4       /* User-Defined Trace Encoding */
00246 
00247 /*
00248 *       pvm_spawn options
00249 */
00250 
00251 #define PvmTaskDefault  0
00252 #define PvmTaskHost             1       /* specify host */
00253 #define PvmTaskArch             2       /* specify architecture */
00254 #define PvmTaskDebug    4       /* start task in debugger */
00255 #define PvmTaskTrace    8       /* process generates trace data */
00256 /* for MPP ports */
00257 #define PvmMppFront             16      /* spawn task on service node */
00258 #define PvmHostCompl    32      /* complement host set */
00259 /* for parent-less spawning */
00260 #define PvmNoSpawnParent        64
00261 
00262 /*
00263 *       pvm_notify kinds
00264 */
00265 
00266 #define PvmTaskExit             1       /* on task exit */
00267 #define PvmHostDelete   2       /* on host fail/delete */
00268 #define PvmHostAdd              3       /* on host startup */
00269 #define PvmRouteAdd             4       /* new task-task route opened */
00270 #define PvmRouteDelete  5       /* task-task route closed */
00271 
00272 /* flags combined with notify kind */
00273 
00274 #define PvmNotifyCancel 256     /* cancel (complete immediately) notifies */
00275 
00276 /*
00277 *       for pvm_setopt and pvm_getopt
00278 */
00279 
00280 #define PvmRoute                        1       /* routing policy */
00281 #define         PvmDontRoute            1       /* don't allow direct task-task links */
00282 #define         PvmAllowDirect          2       /* allow direct links, but don't request */
00283 #define         PvmRouteDirect          3       /* request direct links */
00284 #define PvmDebugMask            2       /* debugmask */
00285 #define PvmAutoErr                      3       /* auto error reporting */
00286 #define PvmOutputTid            4       /* stdout destination for children */
00287 #define PvmOutputCode           5       /* stdout message tag */
00288 #define PvmTraceTid                     6       /* trace destination for children */
00289 #define PvmTraceCode            7       /* trace message tag */
00290 #define PvmTraceBuffer          8       /* trace buffering for children */
00291 #define PvmTraceOptions         9       /* trace options for children */
00292 #define         PvmTraceFull            1       /* do full trace events */
00293 #define         PvmTraceTime            2       /* only do PVM routine timings */
00294 #define         PvmTraceCount           3       /* only do PVM routine profiling */
00295 #define PvmFragSize                     10      /* message fragment size */
00296 #define PvmResvTids                     11      /* allow reserved message tids and codes */
00297 #define PvmSelfOutputTid        12      /* stdout destination for task */
00298 #define PvmSelfOutputCode       13      /* stdout message tag */
00299 #define PvmSelfTraceTid         14      /* trace destination for task */
00300 #define PvmSelfTraceCode        15      /* trace message tag */
00301 #define PvmSelfTraceBuffer      16      /* trace buffering for task */
00302 #define PvmSelfTraceOptions     17      /* trace options for task */
00303 #define PvmShowTids                     18      /* pvm_catchout prints task ids with output */
00304 #define PvmPollType                     19      /* shared memory wait method */
00305 #define         PvmPollConstant         1
00306 #define         PvmPollSleep            2
00307 #define PvmPollTime                     20      /* time before sleep if PvmPollSleep */
00308 #define PvmOutputContext        21      /* stdout message context */
00309 #define PvmTraceContext         22      /* trace message context */
00310 #define PvmSelfOutputContext    23      /* stdout message context */
00311 #define PvmSelfTraceContext     24      /* trace message context */
00312 #define PvmNoReset                      25      /* do not kill task on reset */
00313 
00314 /*
00315 *       for pvm_[sg]ettmask
00316 */
00317 
00318 #define PvmTaskSelf             0       /* this task */
00319 #define PvmTaskChild    1       /* (future) child tasks */
00320 
00321 /*
00322 *       Need to have PvmBaseContext defined
00323 */
00324 
00325 #define PvmBaseContext  0
00326 
00327 /*
00328 *       for message mailbox operations: pvm_putinfo and pvm_recvinfo
00329 */
00330 
00331 #define PvmMboxDefault                  0       /* put: single locked instance */
00332                                                                         /* recv: 1st entry */
00333                                                                         /* start w/index=0 */
00334 #define PvmMboxPersistent               1       /* entry remains after owner exit */
00335 #define PvmMboxMultiInstance    2       /* multiple entries in class */
00336 #define PvmMboxOverWritable             4       /* can write over this entry */
00337 #define PvmMboxFirstAvail               8       /* select 1st index >= specified */
00338 #define PvmMboxReadAndDelete    16      /* atomic read / delete */
00339                                                                         /* requires read & delete rights */
00340 #define PvmMboxWaitForInfo              32      /* for blocking recvinfo */
00341 
00342 
00343 #define PVMNORESETCLASS         "###_PVM_NO_RESET_###"
00344 
00345 #define PVMHOSTERCLASS          "###_PVM_HOSTER_###"
00346 
00347 #define PVMTASKERCLASS          "###_PVM_TASKER_###"
00348 
00349 #define PVMTRACERCLASS          "###_PVM_TRACER_###"
00350 
00351 #define PVMRMCLASS                      "###_PVM_RM_###"
00352 
00353 /*
00354 *       Libpvm error codes
00355 */
00356 
00357 #define PvmOk                   0       /* Success */
00358 #define PvmBadParam             -2      /* Bad parameter */
00359 #define PvmMismatch             -3      /* Parameter mismatch */
00360 #define PvmOverflow             -4      /* Value too large */
00361 #define PvmNoData               -5      /* End of buffer */
00362 #define PvmNoHost               -6      /* No such host */
00363 #define PvmNoFile               -7      /* No such file */
00364 #define PvmDenied               -8      /* Permission denied */
00365 #define PvmNoMem                -10     /* Malloc failed */
00366 #define PvmBadMsg               -12     /* Can't decode message */
00367 #define PvmSysErr               -14     /* Can't contact local daemon */
00368 #define PvmNoBuf                -15     /* No current buffer */
00369 #define PvmNoSuchBuf    -16     /* No such buffer */
00370 #define PvmNullGroup    -17     /* Null group name */
00371 #define PvmDupGroup             -18     /* Already in group */
00372 #define PvmNoGroup              -19     /* No such group */
00373 #define PvmNotInGroup   -20     /* Not in group */
00374 #define PvmNoInst               -21     /* No such instance */
00375 #define PvmHostFail             -22     /* Host failed */
00376 #define PvmNoParent             -23     /* No parent task */
00377 #define PvmNotImpl              -24     /* Not implemented */
00378 #define PvmDSysErr              -25     /* Pvmd system error */
00379 #define PvmBadVersion   -26     /* Version mismatch */
00380 #define PvmOutOfRes             -27     /* Out of resources */
00381 #define PvmDupHost              -28     /* Duplicate host */
00382 #define PvmCantStart    -29     /* Can't start pvmd */
00383 #define PvmAlready              -30     /* Already in progress */
00384 #define PvmNoTask               -31     /* No such task */
00385 #define PvmNotFound             -32     /* Not Found */
00386 #define PvmExists               -33     /* Already exists */
00387 #define PvmHostrNMstr   -34     /* Hoster run on non-master host */
00388 #define PvmParentNotSet -35     /* Spawning parent set PvmNoSpawnParent */
00389 
00390 /*
00391 *       crusty error constants from 3.3, now redefined...
00392 */
00393 #define PvmNoEntry              PvmNotFound     /* No such entry */
00394 #define PvmDupEntry             PvmDenied       /* Duplicate entry */
00395 
00396 /*
00397 *       Data types for pvm_reduce(), pvm_psend(), pvm_precv()
00398 */
00399 
00400 #define PVM_STR                 0       /* string */
00401 #define PVM_BYTE                1       /* byte */
00402 #define PVM_SHORT               2       /* short */
00403 #define PVM_INT                 3       /* int */
00404 #define PVM_FLOAT               4       /* real */
00405 #define PVM_CPLX                5       /* complex */
00406 #define PVM_DOUBLE              6       /* double */
00407 #define PVM_DCPLX               7       /* double complex */
00408 #define PVM_LONG                8       /* long integer */
00409 #define PVM_USHORT              9       /* unsigned short int */
00410 #define PVM_UINT                10      /* unsigned int */
00411 #define PVM_ULONG               11      /* unsigned long int */
00412 
00413 /*
00414 *       returned by pvm_config()
00415 */
00416 
00417 struct pvmhostinfo {
00418    int hi_tid;                  /* pvmd tid */
00419    char *hi_name;               /* host name */
00420    char *hi_arch;               /* host arch */
00421    int hi_speed;                /* cpu relative speed */
00422    int hi_dsig;                 /* data signature */
00423 };
00424 
00425 /*
00426 *       returned by pvm_tasks()
00427 */
00428 
00429 struct pvmtaskinfo {
00430    int ti_tid;                  /* task id */
00431    int ti_ptid;                 /* parent tid */
00432    int ti_host;                 /* pvmd tid */
00433    int ti_flag;                 /* status flags */
00434    char *ti_a_out;              /* a.out name */
00435    int ti_pid;                  /* task (O/S dependent) process id */
00436 };
00437 
00438 /*
00439 *       for pvm_getminfo(), pvm_setminfo()
00440 */
00441 
00442 struct pvmminfo {
00443    int len;                     /* message length */
00444    int ctx;                     /* context */
00445    int tag;                     /* tag */
00446    int wid;                     /* wait id */
00447    int enc;                     /* encoding */
00448    int crc;                     /* crc checksum */
00449    int src;                     /* source tid */
00450    int dst;                     /* destination tid */
00451 };
00452 
00453 /*
00454 *       returned by pvm_getmboxinfo()
00455 */
00456 
00457 struct pvmmboxinfo {
00458    char *mi_name;               /* class name */
00459    int mi_nentries;             /* # of entries for this class */
00460    int *mi_indices;             /* mbox entry indices */
00461    int *mi_owners;              /* mbox entry owner tids */
00462    int *mi_flags;               /* mbox entry flags */
00463 };

00471 #define __ProtoGlarp__(x) ()
00472 #endif
